page_title: How to Make an Offering to Our Church
subtitle: An expression of gratitude and dedication to God
intro: There are several convenient ways to make offerings to our church. All donations are tax-deductible.

envelope.name: Offering Envelope
envelope.instructions: When you visit the church, please use the offering envelopes available in the entrance lobby and place them in the offering box before the service (there is no separate offering time during worship).

mail.name: Mail
mail.instructions: You can send your offering to the above address by mail.

paypal.name: PayPal
paypal.instructions: You can make offerings through PayPal using the link above.

venmo.name: Venmo
venmo.instructions: You can make offerings through Venmo using the link above.

security.title: Security and Important Notes
security.point1: Please verify that you are using the official accounts to protect your personal information
security.point2: Offering receipts are sent out every January
security.point3: Please contact the church for any questions

tax.title: Tax Deduction Information
tax.description: Our church is registered as a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization, so all donations are tax-deductible.
tax.receipt: If you need a year-end offering receipt for tax purposes, please contact the church.

contact.title: Questions
contact.description: If you have any questions about offerings, please contact us:
